mod.js(1,1): error TS1203: Export assignment cannot be used when targeting ECMAScript modules. Consider using 'export default' or another module format instead.


==== requireTwoPropertyAccesses.js (0 errors) ====
    const value = require("./mod").x.y
    console.log(value)
    
==== mod.js (1 errors) ====
    module.exports = {
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        x: {
    ~~~~~~~~
            y: "value"
    ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        }
    ~~~~~
    }
    ~
!!! error TS1203: Export assignment cannot be used when targeting ECMAScript modules. Consider using 'export default' or another module format instead.
